website_summaries.verdict: Billed as a "professional shoe sanitizer," this ultraviolet dryer unit is both compact and fast, effectively killing bacteria and treating foot disease.
pros: Users are happy with how well the unit not only dries out shoes but has also gotten rid of toenail fungus and athlete's foot
Safe enough to be used on a daily basis
Can also be used on other items, such as hats and gloves
cons: Unit will only run for 15 min., so will need to restart the process if a longer dry/sanitize time is needed

customer_reviews.title: Works really well
customer_reviews.text: It works exactly as advertised; you put the bulbs into your shoes, plug in the wall adapter and in 15 minutes your shoes come out smelling much fresher (not a new shoe smell, but a clean ozone like smell). I don't know if this kills 99% of bacteria and fungus like the manufacturer claims - but it does a good job removing the smell. It comes with a certificate from the "Guangdong Detection Center of Microbiology" saying that it kills 99.99% of bacteria - seems legitimate, right?! Ha. My only gripe with this item is that it's not UL listed, so I don't like to leave it unattended while plugged in.
customer_reviews.author: Rob the ToolmanTop Contributor: Woodworking

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was pretty hoaky at the beginning but I had to do something with my stinky shoes/socks when the come out of my shoes. After about a month or two of use I can definitely tell that this works as my shoes and boots no longer smell really bad. I am happy with this product. It would be nice if you could select the amount of run time but you can always just do two cycles.
customer_reviews.author: user

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I had a pricier uv shoe light/drier, and it worked well but didn't have timer. I had to rig one up so the light wouldn't stay on all the time, and used it until one of the non-replaceable lights burned out. This was cheaper and has a timer which is great, but I highly question the build quality of them. I glued them to vertical shoe trees and just slip my shoes on to them when I get home. I feel like the performance has been as expected, and can report that no stinky foot smells remain in any shoes that I use this with.
customer_reviews.author: tallhapa

customer_reviews.title: Worked like a charm
customer_reviews.text: Worked like a charm. I have had chronic athletes foot that was relentless. Properly disinfecting my shoes was key to success.
customer_reviews.author: matt

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for us
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. I purchased these to try to "destink" my son's soccer cleats. I don't know if it is the material or what, but this didn't work at all. For those interested, he has synthetic cleats with a fabric band along the top. Maybe this works with standard leather shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey C

customer_reviews.title: The light has helped significantly with the awful smell imitating ...
customer_reviews.text: The light has helped significantly with the awful smell imitating from my sons cleats. I do, however, have to treat them more than once to get a result.
customer_reviews.author: Mariah

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product about twice a month over a year period. One day it was working, then it wasn't. Just like that. I tried different outlets in the house and the on off switch lights up, but the bulbs don't. I'm past the warranty, but haven't used it that much. I'm annoyed that it didn't last longer for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work well, lasted nearly 2 years
customer_reviews.text: My shoes feel better after using these and it reduces odor. I’ve used them nearly every day for almost 2 years and the lights are only now starting to fail. I looked for replacement bulbs, but the only ones I could find were almost as expensive as buying a new sterilizer (for a single bulb!), so I’m trying a competing product with my next purchase.
customer_reviews.author: KimH

customer_reviews.title: Good product but with defects
customer_reviews.text: Mostly I am satisfied with product , it makes a job. It arrives very fast, with US plug ( 2 blades), so I have to add European type connector. But I think something wrong with my plug, because each time that i connect plug with socket , i see electric spark. Meanwhile I am sanitized my leather and and Crocks boots and my slippers. This device is very useful with disinfection of wool socks since it's impossible to to disinfect them in other method. It's possible to replace bulbs ( but i don't know where I can purchase ). I failed attach a photo
customer_reviews.author: E.S.

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price point
customer_reviews.text: Good product for the price point. In fact I bought an expensive UV pro. It stopped working before two months. I would rather buy this product than the UV pro. Good bang for the buck
customer_reviews.author: Smita Jaisalmeria

customer_reviews.title: They really do work! No more corn chip smell
customer_reviews.text: Oh my gosh these work so well. My fiance had stinky fur lined crocs that he wore with no socks for over a year. They smelled like awful corn chips. To see if this worked I used them in those first and they smell fresh now. No bad odor at all and it even impressed him. I'm ordering two more, one as a back up and one as a gift. I also thought I could make my own uvc box from these mounted inside of a reflective lined thermal bag to disinfect things I bring home from the hospital. I recommend these highly.
customer_reviews.author: Ciara C

customer_reviews.title: Gimmick, waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: Wasted my money, dont waste yours. Did nothing to reduce moisture or smells.
customer_reviews.author: IAN

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last long
customer_reviews.text: For the first couple of months it seemed to reduce the odor in my work shoes (my feet sweat quite a bit so this has been a big issue for me). I felt that it truly worked as advertised and was please with the ease of use and results. That being said, after a couple months of intermittent use (once every week or two), both LED lights appear to have burned out. I am very disappointed that I spent almost $50 on these and they didn't make it a year. The concept of these appears to work well but the poor quality of this specific product should cause people to steer clear of this one.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Can see no evidence that this really works
customer_reviews.text: After using for a few months I see no added benefit and no real results
customer_reviews.author: Shomare

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for about 10 uses & then died
customer_reviews.text: I loved this shoe dryer and it worked great for 2 months with weekly usage on my ballet flats I wore to work as a teacher. I didn't use it at all really when covid shut my job down and I wasn't wearing ballet flats or leaving for work, but then I went back to work. The shoe dryer worked great for 2 weeks then just wouldn't turn on anymore. So, it worked great for about 10 uses, not what I was hoping for...maybe I got a lemon, hopefully they're not all like this.
customer_reviews.author: Carly Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Show odor still there
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure if it actually works but it’s easy to use and I hope it is disinfecting. Odor remains.
customer_reviews.author: M.B

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: It’s awkward to put in shoes and I am not entirely convinced it did anything even after running it in a pair of shoes 15 times. After that it went to the back of my shoe closet.
customer_reviews.author: Meghann

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: It works eventually. My husband and I have stinky feet so this was coming into an established stink fest! I find it works better when used right after we get home. I had to do lots of cycles with our already smelly shoes and it did help, eventually.
customer_reviews.author: Kellyn McClanahan

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I really like these shoe cleaners! They work great and get rid of any smells or moisture in your shoes. They make your shoes feel like new on the inside everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Squirrel

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this item!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this item! It is cheaply made and was broken when we received it!!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan W Hayhurst

customer_reviews.title: Clearly not a good product.
customer_reviews.text: The lights came on but went out after about 30 seconds. Tried several times, reset button, unplugged, etc. Clearly not a good product.
customer_reviews.author: swimmingranny

customer_reviews.title: Great idea, poorly executed.
customer_reviews.text: Takes many cycles to actually sterilize shoes. Bulbs get hot enough to damage my shoes, and I can smell ozone when the unit is on. No strain relievers installed on cables.
customer_reviews.author: Karl birch

customer_reviews.title: It's OK
customer_reviews.text: delivery was blazing fast, and so far so good in the week that I have been using it, no issues at all, it seems to deliver the results as promised. Regards,
customer_reviews.author: Neil de J.

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work great so far. The timer is a bit annoying but probably a good idea for folks who are forgetful like me.
customer_reviews.author: Kim W

customer_reviews.title: BUY THIS ONE...NOT the Eocean
customer_reviews.text: Tried the Eocean UV Sterilizer Light and it stopped working in a few days. This one is going strong after months of daily use.
customer_reviews.author: CingleServing

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work well
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work well although I don’t have a real way to test sterilization. Have used it about 25 times. Unit has worked for 15min consistently in running+dress shoes and boots. Minor complaint would be that the cord is quite rigid, flipping over often as one is trying to avoid looking at the uv light.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Really like this product. Works well to dry out shoe. Does seem to do a good job of sanitizing and prolonging life of the shoe. I use for athletic, work shoes, slippers, etc. (Sometimes I find I might have to run it twice depending on how active I have been.) Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Breaks easy
customer_reviews.text: I don’t think it’s doing anything to sterilize mg shoes . Plus it breaks to easy
customer_reviews.author: Cristina inostros

customer_reviews.title: Second one
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing. Works on shoes, sandals, boots and gloves just about anything you need to dry. Makes a difference keeping shoes from starting and keeping the smell out. Don't expect miracles if you already have the funky smell in your shoe. It makes it better just won't remove it. I have sweaty feet and wear at least two pair of shoes in one day so it is nice
customer_reviews.author: Bullwinkle

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: My foot doctor suggested these to kill fungal spores. Easy to use and they operate easily. I can only assume they are doing the job
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: seems to work
customer_reviews.text: I use this on my work shoes after work to help with the smell and it works wonders. It doesn't get rid off all of the smell but definitely puts a dent in it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are beast
customer_reviews.text: Perf3ect to kill that bacteria in my boot that kep getting my feet to smell. Kill the bacteria, problem gone.
customer_reviews.author: QjQLQQK

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like this product, however it stopped working after daily use for 7 months.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work well enough for me.
customer_reviews.text: I suspect because of the 10 min timer. But it's hard to remember to keep turning it on every 10 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Jay R

customer_reviews.title: Clean shoes
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Makes my shoes smell fresh like ozone.
customer_reviews.author: A shopper

customer_reviews.title: Works great...when it works.
customer_reviews.text: It worked far better than I expected. On the 4th try it wouldn't light up. Then it finally did. Now it won't light up at all. So again, it worked great 5 times. Dead as a doornail. So long money.
customer_reviews.author: Michael A McNeal

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: Smells like plastic burning every time I use. Not sure if it really work!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: This Skeptic Was Amazed!!
customer_reviews.text: Received last night. Used last night on leather, calf-high boots. Did both pair twice. Today, much to my surprise, they are stink-free, even after I just spent the morning walking in them. These are great and I'll be purchasing more units in the future before they're not in the world anymore, or discontinued or whatever. A must-have for stubborn shoe stench!! Particularly after I'm now remembering various shoes I've thrown out over the years because of foot stink, particularly those cheaper models made of man-made materials.
customer_reviews.author: mamatude

customer_reviews.title: Totally worthless in my experience
customer_reviews.text: I ended up putting this in my shoes for over three hours and it had absolutely no effect on shoe odor. None. This is maybe the 3rd or 4th time in a decade that I've posted an Amazon review, but this is SO worthless that I felt I needed to do it this time.
customer_reviews.author: Denver Reader

customer_reviews.title: Get rid of the fungus and bacteria from your sneakers
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and seems like it is working after a couple uses.
customer_reviews.author: Bordo

customer_reviews.title: Used it once so far on my sons stinky work ...
customer_reviews.text: Used it once so far on my sons stinky work boots. (He is a construction worker.) Did remove the odors.
customer_reviews.author: linda

customer_reviews.title: Quit working in less than 30 days!
customer_reviews.text: They worked great but quit working in less than 30 days. Unfortunately went to do return and was one day off of the 30 day return policy.
customer_reviews.author: WizSticks

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this piece of crap. Didn't work from the beginning and is one ...
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy this piece of crap. Didn't work from the beginning and is one of those made in china products
customer_reviews.author: Arturo Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Don't really fully eliminate smell, even if you do ...
customer_reviews.text: Don't really fully eliminate smell, even if you do it over and over again. Tames the small a bit, but then the shoes just smell dully icky.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry

customer_reviews.title: Value for the money
customer_reviews.text: It is a really good staff. It works for the purpose and it can clean the air inside the room as well.
customer_reviews.author: victor

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Does the job at a good price and fits down in my boots also
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work at all!
customer_reviews.text: This product was a waste of money and did not work.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Musgraves

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t have a way to test this for it’s germicidal properties, but it is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Works as described.
customer_reviews.text: A UV light was recommended to use in my shoes by a podiatrist. The product works as described.
customer_reviews.author: Leggs

customer_reviews.title: I am very pleased as it works exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I Was very sceptical about this item.... and I've been using it everyday for last two weeks. I am very pleased as it works exactly as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: M4ri00sh

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical at first, but they seem to be doing the job. I'm pleasantly surprised.
customer_reviews.author: Prime Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made but works
customer_reviews.text: Very cheaply made, light not big enough support to reach from front to back of shoe but works
customer_reviews.author: Edelmiro Pena

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good. Had them for about 5 months
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good. Had them for about 5 months. Not sure on longevity yet. These give off ozone so make sure you use the system in a well ventilated area. Don't breathe it in. You'll smell ozone a bit when these are on. In terms of killing bacteria and mold, they seem to work fine. I don't use them too often, as ozone will damage rubber and leather if the exposure is too frequent. Overall this is a great product idea and these are an affordable way to get the benefit of UVC for shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew James

customer_reviews.title: Now There is No Reason to Wear Stinky Shoes
customer_reviews.text: This really works. I put these in stinky shoes at night and put on ones that smell like new in the morning. The process only takes 15 minutes and features auto shut off.
customer_reviews.author: LKN G-Man

customer_reviews.title: Horrible! Worked the first two times I used it
customer_reviews.text: Horrible! Worked the first two times I used it. Now I have to unplug and replug, shake wires and sometimes it comes on. And now when it decides to function and the lights turn on - they shut off in under five minutes, (instead of the 15 minute cycle). I wish I could give it zero stars. Terrible!!!
customer_reviews.author: schmirretti

customer_reviews.title: Worked once then broke
customer_reviews.text: I used this once and it was great. I went to use it a second time on another pair of shoes and it would on. I returned it for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two shot wonder
customer_reviews.text: It seemed to be somewhat effective the first 2 times it was used and then it just quit working, wouldn't turn on.
customer_reviews.author: yerolman

customer_reviews.title: Not really all that effective in my experience.
customer_reviews.text: I don't notice any real difference even after putting both in one shoe and running it multiple times. The funk is still there (not strong but noticeable) so I have doubts as to how effective these things are. Update - my shoes mildewed in the rain and I have run these multiple times including 2 lights in one shoe. Does nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Alfred James

customer_reviews.title: Unique but usefull Product
customer_reviews.text: Great product and recommended by my husbands foot dr. Seems to be working, along with pills, so am very satisfied...little pricy but its a unique item.
customer_reviews.author: Angel3167

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love how easy this is and convenient to use. Much cheaper then the Dr's office.
customer_reviews.author: boisvert

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Seems very small but could still be working. Very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Coates

customer_reviews.title: Works very well.
customer_reviews.text: Seem to kill the bacteria in all of my shoes. I also use it with caps and gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Does not work as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, but has not been effective at preventing bacteria and fungus and odor in dance shoes - would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: J. Nash

customer_reviews.title: Holy $h!t it works !!!
customer_reviews.text: Well I'll be damned it works!! I was skeptical but I figured I can always return it and shockingly it seemed to work on my hiking boots. I have a boot dryer and it helps but always leaves a little mildew smell. This seems to have cleared it right away after one use!!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working shortly after we started using them. Lights ...
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working shortly after we started using them. Lights flicker and go out.
customer_reviews.author: Lambertsavage

customer_reviews.title: THEY WORK!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a few products with similar claims without anything working. These WORK. I typically run them through a couple of cycles. It's best if you can use them daily after wearing the same pair of shoes the whole day. It will not 100% rid your already smelly shoes ... but it definitely helps A LOT. I think they work best if you use them at the start of a new pair of shoes to maintain them. You have to be practical once shoes are already laid with bacteria there's only so much that can be done. But even that being said, these STILL help drastically with that!
customer_reviews.author: Michaela Nuss

customer_reviews.title: Works great, great value, very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing. Really works. Probably ought to buy another one for the kids to have as their own. Even works on my daughter's athletic shoes and my hunting boots! Warning, though: the stuff you read about the dangers of the UV light aren't kidding. Be sure to put them in place in the shoes, then put an old towel over the opening in the shoes BEFORE turning it on. It does a great job on the shoes, but you don't want even a second of exposure to the light!
customer_reviews.author: J. C. Vest

customer_reviews.title: Both lamps dead after 2 uses
customer_reviews.text: Lamps worked once and seemed to be quite effective. I didn't check the next time I used them, just assuming they weren't already dead. On the third try, I figured I'd check just out of curiosity. I found neither of them working. This is obviously a garbage product.
customer_reviews.author: Corey Shaughnessy

customer_reviews.title: It works like magic
customer_reviews.text: Tried various sprays and sneaker balls before with limited success. This device actually worked the best. Tried on two pairs of sneakers. Used both bulbs in one shoe for 15 minutes and used the same method on the other shoe. All smell is gone. It worked very well. No issue with the button. Easy to use. Don’t know about durability. I used it just two times so far. Will update my review if it breaks down early. Now ordering a second device so that I can sanitize both shoes at the same time
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to get lights in the toe part of the shoes. No cover provided to block lights. Suggestion of using socks to cover light is also not suitable. Shoe sanitizer does not remove shoe odor. I regret purchasing this product and definitely would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: amazing_grace

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Im so happy i bought through the Amazon Prime specials!! It really does work. I usually deordorize my shoes 2 -3 times and the smell is all gone.
customer_reviews.author: Kia

customer_reviews.title: Really works
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. Easy to use. Great value. Only wish the timer ran for 30 minutes. 2 month old work boots still smell brand new. My year old work boots don't smell bad anymore. Simple and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seriously BUY THIS
customer_reviews.text: If you have tried everything... This is the answer! Also make sure to wash feet daily and spray vinegar on feet begore bedtime. No more smelly shoes
customer_reviews.author: hoosiermomma

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done.
customer_reviews.text: My podiatrist was so excited when I told him I'm using this to ward off fungus! I've had several treatments, and the treatments are useless if your shoes re-infect your toes. This, coupled with a spray, and I'm always assured of clean shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime B.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe sanitizer, 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product, works wonders. Even better with new shoes, use everyday and no more smelly shoes. In older shoes run it about 3 times before wearing. Glad I found this product, worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Deby S.

customer_reviews.title: They do get hot and the light can hurt your eyes.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. Cleans and disinfects my shoes and even some clothes just as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Sauickie

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic customer service
customer_reviews.text: We had an issue with this product, it worked fine but we needed help with it. They were quick to respond and very helpful indeed. Would happily buy from them again.
customer_reviews.author: J.E.A. Wallace

customer_reviews.title: the item is easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I like the item. I hope it works. It seems to work. Time will tell. I kept reinfecting myself with athelete foot.
customer_reviews.author: Safirenzi

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: I loved this when I first received it, but it quit working after about a month. I returned it
customer_reviews.author: Metairie-RN mom of 3

customer_reviews.title: I use them all the time as I own a ...
customer_reviews.text: I use them all the time as I own a lot of running shoes & active socks are not breathable. 15 min later, stink free! worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: boompow

customer_reviews.title: I assume they work
customer_reviews.text: I assume they work. Lol I’ve used multiple times. Easy to use. Plug and go
customer_reviews.author: Alissa

customer_reviews.title: Easy!
customer_reviews.text: No way to know if it's really killing all the germs and fungus, but assuming it is, it couldn't be easier to use. I use it in shoes daily.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Smith

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work!
customer_reviews.text: looks good and works well so far, had it a few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They work great! Now if I can get them back from ...
customer_reviews.text: They work great! Now if I can get them back from my husband . . . Well he needs them more than I do.
customer_reviews.author: AKH

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It leaves whatever you place them in with a fresher ionized scent.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Everyone should have this product.
customer_reviews.text: These should come hooked to a house for ease of use. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Joan A.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: This product has kept my son's basketball sneakers smelling fresh! Great product.
customer_reviews.author: DONDER

customer_reviews.title: Works great!.
customer_reviews.text: Works great!...Or seems to. All the smell is out of my shoes, even the sandals. I put mine inside of an old black bad I used to load negatives from rolls of file (yes, I'm old) onto metal reels so I could process them with chemicals and get negatives. The bag is perfect for fitting one pair of shoes. No worry about the light hurting me. I cannot vouch for whether it gets rid of the fungus though. That would take lab tests. I just know I zap the shoes for two or more episodes and the smell is all gone. Love that. Hopefully it's getting rid of the fungus, as it claims, too!
customer_reviews.author: Mandylyn

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Everythin as described, working properly up to date: two months after receiving it
customer_reviews.author: Damian27

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This works great, gets rid of bacteria in shoes and helps eradicate the smell in shoes. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Person

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works when you used for a couple of cycles in a row.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Ackley

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: These deffinetly work. I use them on my work shoes and run them 1-2 cycles and all the moisture and smell is dried up completely.
customer_reviews.author: Myles Szpond

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable, do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this as a replacement for another cheaper UV shoe sterilizer. We have tried using this for about two months, and the first few weeks it worked as advertised. Then the lights would not turn on no matter what. I would not recommend this product, just buy a cheap UV light and replace it when it inevitably stops working. You can buy 3 cheap ones for the price of this one.
customer_reviews.author: Danica

customer_reviews.title: Works Great for 30-40 Days, then Dies
customer_reviews.text: Worked great (used it a couple of times per week) until just past the window to return it. After about 40 days, neither lamp is working. Don't waste your $.
customer_reviews.author: Marty

customer_reviews.title: Bought it and it was working perfect for 2 weeks
customer_reviews.text: Bought it and it was working perfect for 2 weeks. It completely stopped working after 2 weeks. Really disappointed because I loved it at first.
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: TOTALLY USELESS
customer_reviews.text: After three cycles, no effect. Serious triathlete with sweaty sneakers, occasionally get rained on. Developed funky smell. Prior to laundering them (which breaks down some of the materials in running shoes) I decided to try this. USELESS. zero impact. Washing them works. This doesn't.
customer_reviews.author: David L.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Tiny and efficient, does what it is meant to do.
customer_reviews.author: IR100

customer_reviews.title: Work Perfect
customer_reviews.text: It works very well, I use it almost daily is of very good quality
customer_reviews.author: Armenis

product_meta.title: Comyan Shoe Dryer,Household Essential for Family !Drying,Shoes Bad Odor
product_meta.description:
Features:
1, Automatic timing: After power on, 15 minutes will automatically shut down
2,Small size, easy to carry
3, Easy to change, buy one pair of light bulbs they can continue to use
4,It can be used with all shoes. For example: leather shoes, sports shoes, children's shoes, running shoes, etc. and athlete's foot in the shoes. It has a significant drying effect on the sweat of the shoes.
5, With Reset Switch, If you want to stop work, Don’t need to disconnect the Power adapter,just need to press the button “SET” 3 seconds.
6,Constant temperature design, safety: 12V constant DC voltage, stable operation, will not cause overheating to burn the product. Shell plating retardant material, will not cause a fire, safe and secure.
Speciality :
Power Supply: 100-240VAC 50/60HZ
Lamp Power:3Wx2PCS
Wavelength: 253.7 nm
Light intensity: > 2000 µW/cm²
Size: 2.6cm diameter, 8.2cm length
Package includes:
1 * Shoe Dryer
1 * usage manual
feature_bullets: Design science: small size, easy to carry.This design allows more doses of light to illuminate the interior of the object, effectively increasing efficiency. At the same time, it can also be applied to other environments, such as in cars, lockers, wardrobes, and small items.
Easy to operate:Just put shoe Lamp Dryer into your shoes and plug in the adapter. And the smelling of your shoes will be much fresher.
Automatic Timing: when the setting is complete , will automatically shut down after 15 minutes.
Function; drying,the heat generated by the bulb will dry the shoe to a certain extent.
Convenient : One year warranty ,Lightweight and perfect for any trip! CE certified.
